name: FreeHolder (itch)
description:
In FreeHolder, you and two comrades are escaped slaves trying to manage an abandoned frontier farm at the behest of a corrupt census taker in ancient Rome. Farming, survival, combat, crafting, magic, and legions of possibilities await!

We're currently doing an Early Access Patreon campaign. Checkout the demo, and if you like the game consider supporting us here to get early access to the game and help shape its development as a Patron!

www.patreon.com/FreeHolder
